action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X X X X
X X X X ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X X ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with Xs and ▢s, forming a descending diagonal pattern of ▢s from the top right to the bottom left. The top row is all Xs, and each subsequent row has one more ▢, starting from the right.

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 matrix with 'X' symbols forming a diagonal line from the top left to the bottom right. The rest of the grid is filled with '▢' symbols, which are below the diagonal.

QUESTION: In your grid, is the bottom row entirely filled with '▢' symbols?
